face_detect module¶

class face_detect.FaceDectector(img_path, cascade, min_size, max_size, img_id)¶

Bases: object

run_cascade()¶

Create cascae and run on img

Description:
create the Haar cascade classifier [face_cascade] and detector [face_detector] run the detection algorithm on the parsed image [self.img]
Return:
[faces_detect](int): number of faces detected, success = 1, fail > 1, < 1
to_matrix(img_faces)¶

Save detected faces

Description:
transform the coordinates to a matrix and save as a .csv file corresponding to the image identification
Args:
[img_faces](int): array containing the integer coordingnates of the
bound box drawn around the detected face
Return:
[self.err](str): string warning if there was more than one face
detected in the image
